collection.name: The Kraken Lore
collection.description: Welcome to ‘The Kraken Lore,’ where fiction unfolds like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered. Dive into a world of enchanting stories, from mythical realms to untamed adventures. Immerse yourself in the extraordinary, where every page reveals a new wonder.

fd0771f6a48c.bio: A creepy little ghoul writing horror, urban fantasy, and whatever other speculative fiction I feel like throwing up here. I'm fun-scary!

bd45a291dd8d.name: Bradan Writes Stories
bd45a291dd8d.bio: I'm a bacterial bard, and my inkwell is infectious. As disease diplomat, allow my quarantine quill to prescribe a cure, my tales of fantasy to ease your malady.

paragraphs.text: I told Jack I couldn’t swim.

paragraphs.text: Mom is lying on the floor.

paragraphs.name: 19e8
paragraphs.text: The pot is boiling over. The soup is spilling everywhere.

paragraphs.name: 096d
paragraphs.text: “Mom! Mom!” I cry as I push her back and forth. Why isn’t mom waking up?

paragraphs.name: 1fc6
paragraphs.text: More soup is reaching the floor. It’s slowly moving towards mom. It’s hot! Mom will get hurt.
